name: Beach Attack: Gunner Shoot
description:
Are you ready for the Ultimate FPS Action Game!? Defeat waves upon waves of enemies assaulting your position. Hop into your Gunship Helicopter and use your rocket launcher and machine gun to rip the enemy to shreds. They will be attacking you with everything they've got like attack helicopters, tanks and armored vehicles.

Features
- Complete missions divided in regions
- 40 Juicy Missions full of explosive war combat action
- Enjoy realistic gun simulation and animation!
- Enemies attacking you with everything they've got; Gunship Helicopters, Humvees, Tanks, name it and they've got it!
- Optimized controls for a great FPS experience
